item.title: PC USB always on
item.description: TL;DR to switch usb power off when shutting pc down: enable ErP setting in bios to S4+S5. All my usb devices were still on when my pc was shut down I bought a new microphone which had an led on it. When the pc was shut down, the light was still on, annoying more than anything else. I tried the windows 10 power options to no avail. After googling I found some people mentioning a bios setting S5…
